Blog.post: OK? so now yusef knows i like him...but i dont care its not like he would ever go out with me..soo whatever..and i want to know who said i talked that shit about him..because trust me i NEVER did..unless i was on drugs or something..which i never was...so fuck whoever said that. Just wanted to clear this up.

you know what...im done caring about anything...if you dont like me then too damn bad..its not my problem..im just gonna sit back and relax..just agree with everyone..and dont get in the middle of shit..its so annoying..everyone needs to just cut with the fucking drama shit.

Lemon. They've clipped my wings again tore them apart and then left me no use to fly away to my yesterday of freedom my eyes died back that day seeing the hurt I may have done beat my instead of them pain is my only zen of fun. I'll go where secrets are sold Where roses unfold I'll sleep as time goes by So hurting here is where I belong singing a sond blood on my hands to stay strong the flowers in the graveyard are all gone I don't belong there is no right to heal the wrong soup's on hot feelin' like a do or die I can't throw up don't think i even want to try You still can't make me cry you've pinned this butterfly down my fire's burning out kill my flame without a frown and starving hurts the soul when you're hungry for some love so if I close my eyes I can really fly above. I'll go where secrets are sold Where roses unfold I'll sleep as time goes by So hurting here is where I belong dreaming a song blood on my hands to stay strong the flowers in the graveyard are all gone I don't belong there is no right to heal the wronge soup's on hot feelin' like a do or die I can't throw up don't think I even want to try.

yah..ok..soo yeah..tomorrow i go to florida and that should be fun i guess...then i get back and suprise 1 week till a new school..:/ i hate going somewhere where i do not know ANYONE. Im serious...i will miss my friends SO much its not even funny. we will all probably drift from one another..bullshit. I know i know i will meet new people..but its not the same...gah. I need to lose weight before school...i want to be 105-110....dont tell me im not fat..because it doesnt matter what you tell me..i still think i am..soo whatever.

er...Uhm! yeah. i have been listening to my wonderful cds all day. good songs good songs. uhh i go to florida in 3 days..woot! I am oh so bored. UH..heres a list of good songs. -Autumn to ashes/cherry kiss -Bush/Glystorine -Bad Religion/prove it -Death by stereo/little fight uhmm more later.i am too lazy
ehh ..bored. bored. bored.bored.bored.bored.bored.bored.bored.bored..i am soo bored..Eh. yah ..what should i do? dunno mmkay. Im out. later
woot i finally got the time to work!
